pasugiya 08 wanada mema naduwa kadawu awasthawedi withthiye nithignyawaraya adhikaranayen illa sitiye mema wimarshana aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwen iwath kirime niyogayak labadena lesatayi.ehi thinduwa labademin mahesthrathwariya kiya sitiye parikshana katayuthu wenath anshayakata pawarime niyogayak kirimata nithimaya hakiyawak adhikaranayata nomathi bawayi.emenma tharunayan 11 deneku paharagena gos athurudan kirime siddhiya sambandhayen danata athadanguwata gena sitina nawika hamuda buddhi ansha niladharin dedena marthu masa 08 wanada dakwa thawaduratath rakshitha bandhanagara gatha karana lesatayi mahesthrathwariya niyoga kale.emenma mowun dedenata erehiwa minimarum chodanawa yatathe nadu pawarima sidu nokarana lesata sakakaruwange nithignyayan kala illimada mahesthrathwariya ada(22) prathikshepa kala.mema naduwata adalawa danata apa niyama wi sitina hitapu nawika hamuda prakashaka komadoru ngi.ke.pi. dasanayaka athulu 07 denata mayi masa 03 wanada adhikaranaya hamuwe peni sitina lesatayi aya niyoga kale.2008 - 2009 kala wakawanuwe tharunayin 11 deneku balahathkarayen paharagena gos athurudan kirime siddhiya sambandhayen hitapu nawika hamuda prakashaka komadoru di.ke.pi. dasanayaka athulu 09 denekuta erehiwa chodana ella wanawa.
